description: This is the entry point of a React-based frontend application for a Tic-Tac-Toe game, initializing and rendering the main App component within the DOM.

methods.name: ReactDOM.createRoot
methods.description: Creates a root DOM node for React rendering.

methods.name: ReactDOM.createRoot().render
methods.description: Renders React elements into the root DOM node.

methods.name: document.getElementById
methods.description: Fetches a DOM element by its ID.
